features: 【24PCS Beach Toys Set】Our Beach Toys Set for Kids includes 1 collapsible bucket and spade, 2 sand cars (1 kids excavator and 1 sand transporter), 8 castle molds, 5 vehicle molds, 4 sea animal molds, and 1 net bag. This set of Sand Toys is designed for summer children's beach toys, where kids can have fun by identifying sea animals and building castles, helping kids improve their creativity while having fun.

【Safe & Durable Materials】This beach toys set for kids is made of safe, non-toxic and durable ABS material, and the edges of each sand pit toy accessories are smooth, so children will not be injured due to bumps when playing.

【Fun & Educational】Invite good friends to a fun sand toys game party on the beach! This sand pit toy is suitable for 2-4 children to play. Using sand molds in various shapes in the bucket and spade beach set kids, children can build their animal world and small castles, cultivate children's hand-eye coordination. And teamwork ability, stimulate their imagination and creativity. Giving kids hours of joyful creative shaping and sculpting fun, beach toys are the ideal toy for screen-free fun and increased parent-child interaction.

【Convenient Storage】Comes with a reusable mesh bag to store a whole set of beach toys set, kids can carry these beach toys easily. The mesh design can shake off the sand on the toys, keep clean and dry quickly.

【Ideal Summer Gift】Beach Toys Set for Kids contains everything Sand Toys need, complete accessories, bright colors, is a high-quality Sand Pit Toys for boys and girls aged 3-8, a perfect choice for summer beach parties, sand pit games, seaside vacations or other occasions.
description: Product description Bring your beach toys and enjoy the summer fun! Features 1.Sand toys includes 1 collapsible bucket, 2 sand cars (1 kids excavator and 1 sand transporter), 8 castle molds, 5 vehicle molds, 4 sea animal molds. The accessories are rich and diverse, allowing children to give full play to making a variety of sand molds. 2.The beach Toys Set for Kids prioritizes child safety through its construction with environmentally-friendly materials. The set is non-toxic, BPA-free, and meticulously designed without sharp edges or surfaces. Furthermore, each item is appropriately sized for easy gripping by children. 3.Portable and lightweight foldable bucket design is suitable for kids to enjoy summer outdoor travel beach. One mesh beach bag can hold a whole set of bucket and spade beach set kids, and it is easy to shake off sand and water, which is very convenient to carry. 4.Engaging with sand toys fosters children's manual dexterity and cognitive abilities, thereby offering significant pre-school educational value. Such play encourages hands-on exploration and problem-solving, laying a foundation for future learning and development. 5.The Collapsible Bucket and Spade is made of thick silicone, which is not easy to break and can be used for long-term play.
